hymn.title: We must redeem the time!
hymn.category: Hope of Glory—Preparing for Christ's Return

layout.singingstanza: We must re -- deem the time! Let it not slip a -- way, For we will stand be -- fore the Lord That com -- ing day. Re -- deem the time! Seize ev -- ery op -- por -- tu -- ni -- ty; Re -- deem the time!

lyrics.stanza: We must redeem the time! Let it not slip away, For we will stand before the Lord That coming day. Redeem the time! Seize every opportunity; Redeem the time!
We must redeem the time! The Lord is drawing nigh. And just around the bend We'll hear the midnight cry. Redeem the time! Seize every opportunity; Redeem the time!
We must redeem the time! Each opportunity Will come and pass Ne'er to return eternally. Redeem the time! Seize every opportunity; Redeem the time!
We must redeem the time! Buy back the time we've lost. Forsaking all to pay the price Is worth the cost. Redeem the time! Seize every opportunity; Redeem the time!
We must redeem the time! We have not time to spare; Each moment He hath measured For us to prepare. Redeem the time! Seize every opportunity; Redeem the time!
